module.name: Presence State
module.changelog: *13.0.8.1* Get all device states *13.0.8* Provide callable functions to get and set device presence state *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10773 cosmetic fix *13.0.6* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.5* Update menu *13.0.4* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.3* Visual tweaks and fixes *13.0.2* Groups changes in usermanager *12.0.16* Undefined indexes in UCP *12.0.15* Presence state trigger in UCP *12.0.14* Realign *12.0.13* UCP Fixes *12.0.12* Cleanup *12.0.11* More presencestate missing issues *12.0.10* Fix issue in UCP when statuses have never been set *12.0.9* Allow Presencestate to be disabled in UCP *12.0.8* Use textfill for presencestate updates *12.0.7* More spelling *12.0.6* Spelling Mistakes in UCP *12.0.5* UCP Redesign *12.0.4* More UCP Work *12.0.3* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.2* Auto Save on change in UCP *12.0.1* UCP Module Addition *2.11.3* Add license file *2.11.2* Changes and additions for UCP in FreePBX 12 *2.11.1* Add Presence State preferences. *2.11.0* Initial release
